title: Backend Engineer (Python) Job at Afripoint Group Limited
content:
Afripoint Group Limited is a dynamic and innovation-driven organization delivering cutting-edge technology and enterprise solutions across industries. We're on a mission to redefine systems and experiences, and we’re looking for exceptional talent to grow with us.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Backend Engineer (Python)

Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time (Onsite)
Company: Afripoint Group Limited

Role Overview
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We’re looking for a skilled Backend Engineer (Python) to join our engineering team onsite.
	You will be responsible for developing, testing, and maintaining high-quality backend systems and APIs that power our products.
	This role is ideal for someone who is passionate about backend architecture, clean code, and building reliable, scalable systems in Python.


What You’ll Do


	Build and maintain robust RESTful APIs and backend services in Python.
	Architect and optimize scalable server-side applications.
	Collaborate with cross-functional teams including frontend engineers and product managers.
	Work closely with DevOps for deployment, monitoring, and automation tasks.
	Manage databases and ensure data integrity, performance, and security.
	Debug, test, and troubleshoot software and server infrastructure.
	Participate in code reviews and contribute to best practices.
	Stay updated with new backend trends and bring fresh ideas to the table.


What We’re Looking For


	Interested candidates should possess a Bachelor's Degree
	3+ years of backend development experience
	Strong Python skills (Django, Flask, or FastAPI)
	Proficient in working with PostgreSQL, MySQL, or other relational databases
	Experience with Docker, Git, Redis, Celery
	Familiarity with backend security practices
	Excellent debugging and testing skills
	Strong communication and problem-solving skills
	Willingness and availability to work onsite.


Nice to Have:


	Experience with cloud platforms like AWS or Azure
	Familiarity with microservices architecture
	Knowledge of GraphQL or WebSockets
	CI/CD and DevOps experience.


Why Join Afripoint Group?


	Opportunity to work on innovative projects
	A collaborative and fast-paced environment
	Professional growth and mentorship
	Competitive salary and benefits
	Be part of something impactful!


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Cover Letter to: hr@afripointgroup.com using "Backend Engineer (Python) - Onsite" as the subject of the mail.

title: Social Media Manager Job at Wahala No Dey Finish
content:
Wahala No Dey Finish - Come Chop is a food content brand that focuses on creating engaging video content and high-quality visuals. They are active on platforms like YouTube and Facebook, showcasing food-related challenges and culinary showdowns, aiming to build an active and positive online community around their unique brand identity in the food content industry.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Social Media Manager
Job Location: Lagos

Key Responsibilities
Platform Management and Community Engagement:
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Develop, implement, and manage our social media strategy across key platforms, including Instagram, Facebook, and YouTube, ensuring brand consistency and optimal performance.
	Oversee and manage all community interactions, responding promptly and professionally to comments, messages, and inquiries.
	Actively foster an engaged and positive online community, encouraging discussions and user-generated content.
	Monitor social media channels for trends, feedback, and opportunities for engagement.


Content Strategy and Calendar Planning:


	Collaborate with the Content Creator to develop a comprehensive content plan and calendar that aligns with our brand’s tone, values, and overall marketing objectives.
	Schedule and publish content across all social media platforms, ensuring timely and consistent posting.
	Identify and leverage trending topics and relevant conversations to increase brand visibility and engagement.


Performance Analysis and Reporting:


	Track, analyze, and report on key social media metrics, including engagement rates, follower growth, reach, and content performance.
	Provide monthly analytics reports with actionable insights and recommendations for optimizing social media performance.
	Utilize social media analytics tools to monitor campaign effectiveness and identify areas for improvement.


Strategic Input and Collaboration:


	Work closely with the Content Creator and other team members to align social media efforts with broader marketing and business goals.
	Participate actively in content brainstorming sessions, contributing creative ideas for social media campaigns and initiatives.
	Stay up-to-date with the latest social media trends, platform updates, and best practices to ensure our strategy remains cutting-edge.
	Identify and engage with relevant influencers and partners to expand our online reach.


Qualifications and Skills


	Candidates should possess relevant qualifications.
	Proven experience as a Social Media Manager or similar role, with a strong track record of managing and growing social media platforms.
	Demonstrable expertise in social media management tools and analytics platforms.
	Ability to analyze data and translate insights into actionable strategies.
	Exceptional written and verbal communication skills.
	Excellent community management skills, with a proven ability to foster engagement and build online communities.
	Strong understanding of social media algorithms, trends, and best practices across various platforms (Instagram, Facebook, etc).
	Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.
	Passion for food content and a desire to contribute to a growing brand.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Portfolio to: contactwahalanodeyfinish@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

title: Social Media Manager Job at T.O.N Corporate Services
content:
T.O.N Corporate Services  - Our client provides businesses with a professional phone system that enables teams to manage customer calls efficiently. Their goal is to help businesses improve the quality of their customer interactions while enhancing operational efficiency.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Social Media Manager

Job Location: Lagos, Nigeria
Employment Type: Full-time

Role Overview
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We’re looking for a Social Media Manager with strong creative instincts, a strategic mindset, and a deep understanding of internet culture.
	This person will lead our client’s social media efforts, from curating content to managing campaigns, while making sure everything aligns with the brand.
	If you’re someone who loves jumping on trends, turning insights into strategy, and using content to drive real business growth, this role is for you.


Key Responsibilities


	Own and manage all social media platforms (Instagram, Twitter/X, LinkedIn, TikTok)
	Monitor trends, viral content, conversations and tie them back to our client’s mission in a meaningful and timely way
	Plan, curate, and publish creative content across all platforms to increase engagement and visibility
	Track performance metrics and optimise based on data and user insights
	Collaborate cross-functionally with Product, Design, Growth, and Customer Success teams to support marketing campaigns
	Strategically manage organic and paid social campaigns from start to finish
	Use tools like Hootsuite to schedule, monitor, and analyse content performance
	Develop a consistent tone of voice that builds brand recognition and strengthens community trust


Key Success Metrics


	Growth in engagement rate and follower count across platforms
	Increase in link clicks and social-driven web traffic
	Improved brand visibility and consistency online
	Campaign success rates based on defined objectives (reach, engagement, conversions)
	Timely and relevant engagement with social trends
	Quality of content and alignment with brand essence


Requirements


	3+ years of experience managing social media for a brand, preferably in a fast-paced environment
	Strong understanding of social media algorithms, culture, and real-time marketing
	A creative thinker with the ability to execute ideas fast
	Proficiency in social media scheduling and analytics tools (e.g. Hootsuite, Buffer, Later, etc.)
	Excellent written communication skills and an eye for compelling visuals
	Familiarity with tools like Canva, CapCut, or Adobe Suite is a plus
	Analytical and data-driven, comfortable using insights to guide strategy


Benefits


	Be part of a company solving a deep and urgent problem for African businesses
	Collaborate with a smart, driven, and kind team
	Freedom to take ownership and innovate
	Opportunity to shape the voice of one of Africa’s most promising startups
	Work remotely with flexible hours
	Competitive salary and performance-based growth opportunities
    

    

        Click here to Apply
